data.text: @xatyrosdi Thanks Izzati. Got 4 tubs in the fridge. Good news is that the PCR today is -ve so it's possibly just a sore throat.
@Basket_Case_MY I don’t know the beer is good for the sore throat, but it’s definitely enhance relaxation and make you don’t think about the Covid 🤣🤣 GWS!
@Basket_Case_MY Take care. Drink lots of fluid. Ice cream helps with the spre throat. I had to order tubes of ice cream when my family caught covid.
@Basket_Case_MY Alamak ! Minum air yer and not beer
@justpaniata Thanks mate. Hopefully nothing as RTKs & PCR since possible close contact all turned out -ve.

@Beverley_Ong Into isolation liao. After my walk I felt a little sore & thought it was due to dehydration. Already scheduled my PCR today so when swabbed, the doc said looks inflamed so tell me to isolate to be on safe side. Will repeat PCR next week. Feeling fine with the lozenge. https://t.co/6IyDnN4kql
